Hile sorunu çözülmeli. Onun dışında CS işte ne denilebilir
One of the best games of my life

CS:GO is a great shooting game and I personally would recommend it to every person that just got a PC and wants to get into shooting games. CS:GO is a shooting game with multiple gamemodes and also has a ranking system for players that play competitive, which is really cool and is a must have for shooter games. The game is not pay-to-win which is great! You can purchase in-game cosmetics like gun skins which is again, cool.

This game is so good. CSGO is life, CSGO is love, CSGO is hacker-free! CSGO is a competitive FPS shooter with TWO TEAMS. The Terrorist team or the Counter Terrorist team. The objective of the game is the terrorists have to plant the bomb and the CT's (counter terrorists) have to try to stop them! CSGO has a lot of friendly players who support each other like FAMILY. CSGO also has a huge marketplace to get cool skins for your guns! CSGO overall is a VERY COOL GAME and I would like to personally thank the creators for a beautiful game.
